result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dangelo D Robinson

records.addlTxt: Pretrial Services Discharge Report 10-6-2022, filed.
signed and filed.

Defendant Dangelo D Robinson not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Status conference held. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued REMAND TO COMMISSIONER. Court takes no action as to bail.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report-9-29-2022, filed.

Defendant Dangelo D Robinson appeared by video.  Attorney Lauren Avery Blumenthal appeared by video for Dangelo D Robinson.  Prosecuting attorney Tristan J. Bednarek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for Motion Hearing. Attorney Blumenthal informs court that there has been a breakdown in communication that is irreconcilable.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Attorney is to inform the Public Defender's Office that new counsel needs to be appointed.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to Br 29.
Status conference scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 8.29.2022, filed.

Case set for a scheduling conference on 7/29/22. Court is down and unable to hear the matter. Defense counsel requests a motion to withdraw hearing. Motion hearing set for 8/29/22 at 8:30 am. Parties notified via email.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7.29.2022, filed.

Defendant Dangelo D Robinson in court with attorney Lauren Avery Blumenthal.  Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Scheduling conference held. Defense counsel has discovery and requests an additional scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 29, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report 7.1.2022, filed.

MATTER HEARD OFF THE RECORD. Defense counsel requests an additional scheduling conference.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Due to lower pending case, defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Kiefer, Branch 29. Atty. Blumenthal challenges probable cause.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.

Defendant Dangelo D Robinson in court.  
Atty. Lauren Blumenthal appeared as a friend of the court.
Lisa M Valenti-Jordan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Case is adjourned to Br. 29.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
